title: Review: Scope Artech 4 Wheels – Lightweight, Aero, and Impressively Engineered
content:
The Scope Artech 4 has 3D printed hubs and biomimicry, but with a weight this low, riding up a mountain just made sense.

Read the full article at Review: Scope Artech 4 Wheels – Lightweight, Aero, and Impressively Engineered on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
